short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use HyperComply to fill out web form security evaluations.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use the HyperComply Form Assistant to search your HyperComply knowledge base without leaving your current tab. The extension gives you the ability to either directly fill out form fields on the page with the click of a button, or copy the answer text to insert it yourself.
